title: Plat 2 LFT Able to play any role except support and jungle!
body: Happy and friendly summoner! Would love to try myself in teams willing to give me a shot!

replies.body: Added you, Team of plat and gold players looking for an extra player. Our team got in gold last season, keen to hopefully get plat or higher this season.

Add me demonsiayer

I got a gold 5 ranked team and keen to have you come along and join me! Hopefully we can get some ranked 5 games going tonight =)
